title: Grilled Planted Chicken Margherita
instructions: Season the planted.chicken with Italian herbs, salt, and pepper, then brush with olive oil.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken over medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes per side until golden and charred.
Top each grilled chicken piece with a slice of fresh mozzarella and cover briefly to melt.
Dice fresh tomatoes and mix with minced garlic, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper for a quick bruschetta topping.
Place the mozzarella-topped chicken on a plate, spoon the tomato mixture over the top.
Garnish generously with fresh basil leaves and a drizzle of balsamic glaze before serving.
